channel.title: Making multiple accounts able to give admin on a 508
channel.description: Hi guys, well when I try to make it so that me AND my co-owner can make admins on a 517 I add to names but then only one of the name works and the other doesn't (his). Can you please help me? I really want him to be able to have these rights since I'm not on that often... [b]So if you have a working code, that includes two users, please tell me.[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2010, 09:36:46 pm[/size][hr]help please!

item.title: Making multiple accounts able to give admin on a 508
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Hi guys, well when I try to make it so that me AND my co-owner can make admins on a 517 I add to names but then only one of the name works and the other doesn’t (his). Can you please help me? I really want him to be able to have these rights since I’m not on that often…
So if you have a working code, that includes two users, please tell me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2010, 09:36:46 pm[/size][hr]help please!

Read full topic
